column3: Faculty of Health Medicine and Life Sciences
column5: Design and conduct studies in order to find determinants of health and diseaseAre you interested in the basic mechanisms that underlie health and disease? Do you want to learn how to examine their occurrences and determinants in contexts such as clinical practice and healthcare policy? Are you interested in pursuing or developing your career as an epidemiological researcher or policy adviser in public health or clinical medicine? Then Epidemiology could be just the programme for
